Posted By: majinara (1/30/2012 12:29:07 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Not incredible but if you're calling it unplayable even in limited you need to educate yourself on card advantage. Did you play [Last Kiss](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Last Kiss) in Rise because you needed 2 life or because it was 2 damage for 3? Now you get that same 2 damage for 3 plus card advantage by getting to cast it one more time.
  
   
Is six off-color an ugly cost for flashback? Sure. But I'd pay 10 if I need something burned and we've reached the late game with empty hands. The option to flash it back is better than not having that option no matter how much it costs to use.
posts.html:
Not incredible but if you're calling it unplayable even in limited you need to educate yourself on card advantage. Did you play Last Kiss in Rise because you needed 2 life or because it was 2 damage for 3? Now you get that same 2 damage for 3 plus card advantage by getting to cast it one more time.

Is six off-color an ugly cost for flashback? Sure. But I'd pay 10 if I need something burned and we've reached the late game with empty hands. The option to flash it back is better than not having that option no matter how much it costs to use.
